definition:
This will be a guide to textbook projects on PM. Since I don’t know if
there currently are any textbook projects on PM, this is just a “stub”
entry for now. If you create a textbook project, please add a link to it
here. Let me know what other things you would like to see as part of
this entry. (Eventually we will probably create a documentation item for
textbook writing.) I think the 00-01 category can and should contain
articles *about* instructional exposition, just as well as examples of
instructional exposition, so perhaps such discussions can begin here as
well, and then branch off into other entries as that becomes convenient.

An example of the sort of textbook we might want to have would be: a
free book comparable to *Introduction to Algorithms* by Cormen *et al.*.

-   Statistics on PlanetMath
